title: Federated EndoViT: Pretraining Vision Transformers via Federated Learning on Endoscopic Image Collections
details: M Kirchner, AC Jenke, S Bodenstedt, FR Kolbinger… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: Purpose: In this study, we investigate the training of foundation models using federated learning to address data-sharing limitations and enable collaborative model training without data transfer for minimally invasive surgery. Methods: Inspired …
